txt.en: Grazadhrú and wood-trolls can be found in Ered Mithrin.\n\nYou should defeat wood-trolls.
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Grazadhrú, a terrible creature in Ered Mithrin.
You have defeated Grazadhrú and assisted the expedition.

The bounty notice is written on coarse paper. It reads:

'I thought it was a tree at first, but what tree could exude such menace? It was more troll than tree, if you want this dwarf's opinion. What do you do with a thing like that? Chop it down? Stack it for lumber? I don't know.

'What I do know is that something should be done about it. I offer a reward for anyone who can uproot some of these wood-trolls from the Ered Mithrin. If you see the worst of the lot, the one that folk of these high places call Grazadhrú, be sure to give him your special attention. I don't like trees at the best of times, but these wood-trolls make for the worst of times, if you ask me!'
